name: Fragments (itch) (JulienLussiez)
description:
Description An entry for the UE4 Megajam 2018.
Fragments is a game where the player has to juggle between different fragments of reality to make his way through the levels.

Gameplay Instructions 
Some people reported a bug after level 6. To avoid it and access the last level, press R key on title to reset the game when you start the game. Sorry for that :)

Gamepad : Use the joystick to move, triggers to change reality, and A button to jump.
Keyboard : Use arrow keys to move, space bar to change reality and Up key to jump.
